author: ratz
title: nothing special
review: sets like this seem just to be mede to stock up your brick reservoir. this one contains few plates and mainly basics. the instructions show nothing ingenious, so you have to rely on your own imagination or just pour the bricks into your basics-supply.

author: mrmitch
title: Just adding to my extra bulk bricks
review: Would not have gotten this set unless it was on sale. I picked it up for two US dollars, not bad for 100 LEGO pieces. I sorted them into thier proper tubs once at home and are used in our freestyle building. Nothing to brag about just more bircks for the collection.

author: Zapp_Brannigan
title: Good for portable play, otherwise nothing great
review: This set is not too special it just adds to your collection. However, this set is good if you want to bring something to play with during a trip, as it is mess free and very easy to clean up. It comes with basic bricks and a few small plates, plus an idea book for some of the things you can build. Other than that possibilities are very limited and I guarantee that if you ever got this set, it would have been scattered along with your collection in no less than a week.
